ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence
Interface SlotPath

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SlotPathImp
public interface SlotPath
extends java.lang.Cloneable

Builds a general path by transforming the sequence-specific coords, to coords on the screen in an appropriate slot.

          Clears SlotPath

getBackbone

Backbone getBackbone()

moveTo

void moveTo(double base,
            double heightInSlot)
Adds a point at the passed location.

Parameters:
base - The base on the sequence.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot (0 = center) (-1 to 1)

moveTo

void moveTo(double base,
            double heightInSlot,
            SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
Adds a point at the passed location.

Parameters:
base - The base on the sequence.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot (0 = center) (-1 to 1)
orientation - The orientation of the point on the overall shape.

moveTo

void moveTo(double base,
            double heightInSlot,
            double lengthFromBase)
Move to the location defined by (base, heightInSlot) + offset = (lengthFromBase, height)

Parameters:
base - The base pair value to move to.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot to move to.
lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to move to.

moveTo

void moveTo(double base,
            double heightInSlot,
            double lengthFromBase,
            SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
Move to the location defined by (base, heightInSlot) + offset = (lengthFromBase, height)

Parameters:
base - The base pair value to move to.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot to move to.
lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to move to.
orientation - The orientation of the point on the overall shape.

lineTo

void lineTo(double base,
            double heightInSlot,
            Direction direction,
            SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates. The line will be straight in sequence coordinates, but may be curved in actual coordinates.

Parameters:
base - The base on the sequence.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot (0 = center) (-1 to 1)
direction - The direction to draw the line along the sequence.
orientation - The orientation of the line.

lineTo

void lineTo(double base,
            double heightInSlot,
            Direction direction)
Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates. The line will be straight in sequence coordinates, but may be curved in actual coordinates.

Parameters:
base - The base on the sequence.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot (0 = center) (-1 to 1)
direction - The direction to draw the line along the sequence.

realLineTo

void realLineTo(double base,
                double heightInSlot,
                double lengthFromBase,
                SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
Defines a true line to the point defined by (base,heightInSlot) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).

Parameters:
base - The base pair value to draw to.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot to draw to.
lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.
orientation - The orientation of the line.

realLineTo

                double heightInSlot,
                double lengthFromBase)

Parameters:
base - The base pair value to draw to.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot to draw to.
lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.

lineTo

void lineTo(double base,
            double heightInSlot,
            double lengthFromBase,
            Direction direction,
            SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
Defines a line (in terms of sequence coordinates) to the point defined by (base,heightInSlot) + an offset (in terms of lengthFromBase, height).

Parameters:
base - The base pair value to draw to.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot to draw to.
lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.
direction - The direction to draw the line along the sequence.
orientation - The orientation of the line.

Parameters:
base - The base pair value to draw to.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot to draw to.
lengthFromBase - The length from the base pair (in sequence coordinates) to draw to.
direction - The direction to draw the line along the sequence.

lineTo

void lineTo(double base,
            Direction direction,
            SequencePath.Orientation orientation)
Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates using the previous heightInSlot (or 0 if no previous heightInSlot).

Parameters:
base - The base on the sequence.
direction - The direction to draw the line along the sequence.
orientation - The orientation of the line.

direction - The direction to draw the line along the sequence.

Closes the path, draws line back to coords of last moveTo.

Parameters:
orientation - The orientation of the close segment.

Returns:

Builds a shape which stretches all the way along the backbone.

Parameters:

Returns:
